title: How do I install, manage, and uninstall applications?
answer:
Installing applications 

 1. Touch the application you want to install, and follow the onscreen instructions to install it. 

 1. In File Manager, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111153) > Internal, and select applications you want to install. 

 Managing and uninstalling applications 

 Go to Settings > Manage apps.
